description:
Student council president Yayoi plots to destroy the Survival Game Club!
Influenced by a yakuza movie, the Survival Game Club members launch into a lawless battle for the boss` seat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La vengeance de Yaoi Isurugi, la présidente du Conseil des élèves – Pitoyable combat sans code d`honneur
Revenge of Isurugi Yayoi, Student Council President! / Disgustingly Immoral Battle
Seito Kaichou Isurugi Yayoi no Fukushuu! / Akireru hodo Jinkinaki Tatakai
生徒会長石動やよいの復讐! / 呆れるほど仁義なき戦い
